title: About Me
content:
Hey! I'm Anirudh - a Software Engineer,
grad student at the University of Florida,
and someone who believes the best code
is written after a good volleyball game
and a home-cooked meal.

---

By day, I build scalable full-stack apps
at Accoladi.com, architecting systems
that handle 100K+ daily requests. I love
the puzzle of turning messy problems into
clean, performant solutions.

By night? You'll find me lost in a fantasy
novel (currently on TBATE), experimenting
with recipes in the kitchen, or gaming
with friends.

---

What gets me excited:
  > Real-time systems
  > AI/ML applications
  > Infrastructure that just works

Finishing M.Sc. in CS (May 2025).
Building something cool? Let's chat!
